title: Are You A Movie Maniac? Trivia
creator: Flex Solutions

extendedInfo.description: Play âAre You A Movie Maniacâ trivia and expand your knowledge about movies, TV and celebrities.Hundreds of fun and challenging questions about movies, TV and celebrities covering decades of entertainmentWe make it more social. Challenge your facebook friends, share results...Compare your result with other players using submit world scores futurePlay:-Questions divided in packs from several genres including Blockbusters, Series, Animated Moviesâ¦ -Game ends when all three lives are usedHelp Types:-"50:50"- Removes 2 wrong answers.-"swap" â Change the question and present you with a new one.-"2 shots" â Answer two times on same questionBonuses, medals and awards:-win bonus live for 3 correct answers in a row-complete all level medals -compete with your friends over a highscore-great user interface PACKS INCLUDED:-BLOCKBUSTERS(Harry Potter movies, Twilight Movie, Kung Fu Panda, Lord of the Rings, Batman, The Matrix, Shrek, Avatar, Star Wars, The Hangover, Inception ...)-SERIES (Game of Thrones, Grey's Anatomy, Dexter, Glee, The Vampire Diaries, Prison Break, Friends, Desperate Housewives, NCIS, Bones, Private Practice ...)-ANIMATED (Shrek, Ice Age, Megamind, UP, Rio, Kung fu panda, Despicable Me, Wall-e, Nemo, The SpongeBob ...)-FAMILY (Soon)-HORROR (Soon)- more...âWin all achievements and become the ultimate entertainment trivia master âPlay even when you don't have access to the internetTags:Becomes Rich, Trivia Burst, Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?, Logos Quiz, Logo Quiz, Logo, Trivia, Movie, Film, Series, Movie Trivia, Quiz

reviews.title: Questions are too random.
reviews.comment: The app works great and can be fun but there are a lot of words misspelled and most of the questions are about Kristen stewert. When theyre not about kristen theyre too complicated such as having to guess the first names of tom hanks parents or how many siblings does kristen stewart have...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game, nice screenshots, easy layout. Lots of fun.
reviews.comment: Enjoy playing this cool game with movies galore!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Are you a movie maniac
reviews.comment: I think you should have a bigger selection of movies and tv series. Ever since the last up date it lost all my progress and now I have to start over. Not happy. When are you adding the next two subjects? It has been a very long time with no new subjects.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TV series pack fun
reviews.comment: like that it\'s a mixture of current & somewhat older primetime shows w/a variety of detail oriented questions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but
reviews.comment: Love this app but everytime it updates it still won\'t unlock the last 2 packs,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jenn.Segner
reviews.comment: Sometimes the ?\'s repeat, but it that is the only thing I can complain about. Great game. Someone help. I can\'t stop playing it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app
reviews.comment: I\'m on level 21 now on my phone and has taken me ages (from the summer time to now) . Can\'t wait for the update :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Would like to see more questions from older movies. Less questions about actors middle names or birthdays. Please add rotation feature for landscape view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Charlotte Barratt
reviews.comment: Great game I recommend to any one who loves trivia movies and trivia on movies. Brilliant game I just need to watch a few more movies and get all of them correct it is an awesome game though so every one who reads my. Comment you have to get this game and one good thing about it is that its free.
reviews.author: Charlotte Barratt

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Not the best only because these facebook adds keep popping up and its really annoying, but other than that... not bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs more questions
reviews.comment: the category should be broken down into more specific types of movies. also the questions repeat quite a bit. add more specific categories and better questions and I\'ll definitely give you 5 stars. other than that I love playing the game it could be so much better than just good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok.
reviews.comment: This is a cool concept but I wish the questions were better moderated. Some don\'t make sense, are incorrect or are badly spelled.
reviews.author: Kat Palma

reviews.title: Pretty bad
reviews.comment: Bad spelling in some questions, most questions don\'t even make sense, questions repeated over and over, in some cases there are two of the same answer on a question, of which is the correct answer so you have to test your luck at which one you choose. wouldn\'t recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game but you should be  able to do any category no matter level your at. Just saying!
reviews.author: Liam David Hoffmann

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Really entertaining!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Facebook!? Really!?
reviews.comment: Oh my gosh...like freakin Facebook Isn\'t!? shoved down our throats enough by, well...Ev-er-y Thing!?! Don\'t keep poppin up \"sign in to FB\" in the middle of playing the game like every 20 seconds!!! If I wanted to be logged in to Facebook I would be! I don\'t need a game I\'m playing to continuously tell me to log in, While! I\'m just trying to play the freaking game already! Crap! Enough!
reviews.author: Katie Baldwin

reviews.title: More levels!
reviews.comment: Its a good game but when are we gonna see the family and horror category. Fixing to uninstall. Plz upgrade soon! And more new movie questions.  We dont live in the stone age.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Nothing else to say then I\'m so obsessed
reviews.author: Krisindat Sook

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: But please update more often!!! Where is horror? Newer films and tv shows?? That would be great!!!!!

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Some of the questions have very poor grammar. Some are incorrect.
